name: Send SignRequests from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Make will watch your Google Sheets spreadsheet for new rows at regular intervals and send signature requests using SignRequest. Requests will be created from a specified template. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rlSN3ZpfUumVv1Tetfwb16-VE8RBtmTOw0cKpdCJByE/edit?usp=sharing).
